title: News reports from France. [No. 71/76] = Chroniques de France
brief_description: Cinemagazine: 1. Helen of Troy at Avignon - Avignon, August 1971: restaging of “The Trojan War will not take place”, by Jean Giraudoux. 2. The Opera Dancing School and Degas - Painter and sculptor Degas and his favourite models. 3. The preservation of nature: III Annecy Lake - Pollution threatened one of the most beautiful of Alpine lakes. It will only survive if the delicate biological equilibrium is maintained. 4. Georges Brassens - A portrait of the famous singer-poet.
